name: Hentai Tales: Conception Shrine
description:
GamePlay

Enjoy the story while completing the puzzles.
Connect lines according to the numbers on the squares until all spaces are completed.
After completing the puzzle, you will get a diary of the protagonist's experience.
Collect all diaries to experience the complete story.

Story Background

There is a shrine called the Conception Shrine. It is said that women who come here will be able to conceive as long as they worship the abbot. Therefore, this shrine is famous and popular with a large number of childless women.
You are the abbot of this shrine. The reason why you make women 100% pregnant is none other than the strong semen.
This is a story about you having sex with countless women in a shrine.

Characters

Yuzuki:

A 22-year-old woman came to the shrine seeking help after years of unsuccessful attempts to conceive.
She is kind and obedient, but also has an underlying desire for sexual pleasure that she doesn't often get.

Rinna:

A 24-year-old wife went to the Conception Shrine hoping to have a second child after giving birth once.
Her husband died in a car accident, leaving her alone and longing for the feeling of being loved by another man.

Ayumi:

A 20-year-old woman, a journalist, is here not to get pregnant but to report the facts, but she also wants to get pregnant in her mind.

Features

  • An imaginary fantasy erotic story with heroines who have unique personalities.
  • 20 sexy erotic CGs of heroines.
  • Skip puzzles whenever you want. (Press Enter at puzzle).
  • CG appreciation mode. (Click the CG next to it after completing the puzzle)
